revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Intermec |model = 2126 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = DSSS |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = PCMCIA (16-bit) |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = EHA2126 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:02:2D,00:60:1D
|chip1 = Digital Ocean;Shark; |chip2 = Lucent;THESEUS L; |chip3 = Philips;; |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = MC |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = <!-- Number of transmit radio chains --> |rxchains = <!-- Number of receive radio chains --> |sstreams = <!-- Number of spatial data streams --> |wirelessstand = legacy (DSSS) |wififreq = <!-- 2.4 or 5, 60 --> |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = board assy,parts list |802dot11_protocols = legacy (DSSS) |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/10/1999 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This card (a '''<small>WaveLAN/IEEE PC Card type 2</small>''', filed with the FCC in March 1999) is shown (in the '''black and white''' FCC photos) as using a THESEUS L baseband, which would be a even lower classification than the THESEUS M used in the [[Lucent WaveLAN Bronze]]. The card is 2Mbps capable. :It would seem obvious that '''Intermec''' used this same FCC ID for later 802.11b compliant models.
The '''Digital Ocean''' and '''Lucent''' branded MAC is labeled '''Shark''' in the parts list in the FCC documents.
{{WiFiCert|W000074|11/22/2000}}
==Pictures== <center>'''FCCID {{fccid|EHA2126}}''' <gallery caption="FCC photos" widths="250px" heights="180px"> File:Intermec 2126 WaveLAN MAC BB side cans on.jpg|MAC/BB side, RF shields on File:Intermec 2126 WaveLAN MAC BB side cans off.jpg|MAC/BB side, RF shields off File:Intermec 2126 WaveLAN flash side cans on.jpg|Flash side, RF shields on File:Intermec 2126 WaveLAN flash side cans off.jpg|Flash side, RF shields off </gallery></center>[[Has images::fcc| ]]
